headline.main: Suicidal Germanwings Pilot Had Struggled in US Flight School
headline.print_headline: Suicidal Germanwings Pilot Had Struggled in US Flight School

docs.snippet: The German pilot who deliberately flew his airliner into a mountainside last year had struggled with learning to fly and had failed a key test of his skills during training in the U.S., according to FBI interviews with his flight instructors....
docs.lead_paragraph: The German pilot who deliberately flew his airliner into a mountainside last year had struggled with learning to fly and had failed a key test of his skills during training in the U.S., according to FBI interviews with his flight instructors.

docs.snippet: From the archives of the International Herald Tribune: President Johnson says the U.S. could face a series of crises if the roots of the Vietnam war’s causes aren’t targeted....
docs.abstract: From the archives of the International Herald Tribune: President Johnson says the U.S. could face a series of crises if the roots of the Vietnam war’s causes aren’t targeted.

headline.main: Ceasefire Holding Between Turkey and Kurdish Fighters in Syria
headline.print_headline: Ceasefire Holding Between Turkey and Kurdish Fighters in Syria

docs.snippet: A ceasefire is holding between Turkey and Kurdish-backed militia in northern Syria, a Kurdish military official said on Tuesday, but a Syrian rebel commander characterised it only as a "pause" and added that military operations would resume soon....
docs.lead_paragraph: A ceasefire is holding between Turkey and Kurdish-backed militia in northern Syria, a Kurdish military official said on Tuesday, but a Syrian rebel commander characterised it only as a "pause" and added that military operations would resume soon.

headline.main: USDA to Reopen Offices Closed After Email Threats

docs.snippet: The Agriculture Department will reopen some offices Wednesday that were closed after an unspecified email threat....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Agriculture Department will reopen some offices Wednesday that were closed after an unspecified email threat.

headline.main: Border Deal With Montenegro Stirs Tensions in Kosovo
headline.print_headline: Border Deal With Montenegro Stirs Tensions in Kosovo

docs.snippet: High in the Cursed Mountains that span Kosovo and Montenegro, lumberjack Rame Elezaj and his family have earned a living from their trees for decades....

headline.main: Health Commissioner: State Acted Properly on Tainted Water
headline.print_headline: Health Commissioner: State Acted Properly on Tainted Water

docs.snippet: The state followed federal guidelines in addressing industrial chemical contamination of a village's drinking water, but the Environmental Protection Agency gave "confusing, changing and inconsistent guidance," New York Health Commissioner Howard ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The state followed federal guidelines in addressing industrial chemical contamination of a village's drinking water, but the Environmental Protection Agency gave "confusing, changing and inconsistent guidance," New York Health Commissioner Howard Zucker said Tuesday.

headline.main: Bill to Increase Farm Overtime Moves to California Governor
headline.print_headline: Bill to Increase Farm Overtime Moves to California Governor

docs.snippet: California Gov. Jerry Brown will again consider a historic proposal calling for farmworkers to receive the same overtime pay as other hourly workers, after the Assembly approved legislation to phase in the change....
docs.lead_paragraph: California Gov. Jerry Brown will again consider a historic proposal calling for farmworkers to receive the same overtime pay as other hourly workers, after the Assembly approved legislation to phase in the change.

headline.main: Rubio, Murphy Win Florida's Senate Primaries
headline.print_headline: Rubio, Murphy Win Florida's Senate Primaries

docs.snippet: Republican Sen. Marco Rubio and Democratic U.S. Rep. Patrick Murphy each easily won their Senate primaries Tuesday, setting up a November showdown that's guaranteed to be nasty as each party grapples for a majority in the chamber....
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican Sen. Marco Rubio and Democratic U.S. Rep. Patrick Murphy each easily won their Senate primaries Tuesday, setting up a November showdown that's guaranteed to be nasty as each party grapples for a majority in the chamber.

headline.main: Shell's U.S Deal to Unlock Global Oil Asset Disposals
headline.print_headline: Shell's U.S Deal to Unlock Global Oil Asset Disposals

docs.snippet: Royal Dutch Shell's first oil field sale after its $54 billion BG Group acquisition bodes well for its disposal talks in the North Sea, Gabon and New Zealand, according to sources, signaling buyers will meet its expectations on value....
docs.lead_paragraph: Royal Dutch Shell's first oil field sale after its $54 billion BG Group acquisition bodes well for its disposal talks in the North Sea, Gabon and New Zealand, according to sources, signaling buyers will meet its expectations on value.
